content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that exploring the reasons behind neglecting certain areas in my life will help uncover meaningful questions that need addressing. As a next step, I will set aside dedicated time for reflection to examine these neglected areas, focusing on underlying beliefs and assumptions that might have prevented me from asking pertinent questions. Additionally, I will research personal reflection techniques to regularly evaluate and adjust my focus, ensuring a balanced approach to personal growth.

metadata.trigger: What's a question I haven't asked myself in a while?
